jpen.owner
Interface PenOwner.PenManagerHandle

Enclosing interface:
PenOwner
public static interface PenOwner.PenManagerHandle

Wraps a PenManager and defines extra accessor methods. See PenOwner.setPenManagerHandle(PenManagerHandle).
